thread.title: Seattle Seahawks coach Pete Carroll shoots down USC coaching rumor
thread.title_full: Seattle Seahawks coach Pete Carroll shoots down USC coaching rumor | The Seattle Times

author: Jayson Jenks
title: Seattle Seahawks coach Pete Carroll shoots down USC coaching rumor
text:
It seems everyone’s name is being thrown into the hat for the vacant USC coaching job, including Pete Carroll, who left the school in 2010 to become the Seahawks’ coach.
Dan Patrick said Monday on his radio show that he was told Carroll “would listen to go back to USC,” and added that Carroll’s name has been thrown around in other candidate lists.
When asked about those rumors Monday, including Patrick’s, Carroll shot back, “I would say this: I love USC. It’s a great place. Flattered. I appreciate it, Dan. But that’s not happening. We’re in good shape here.”
Jayson Jenks : 206-464-8277 or jjenks@seattletimes.com ; on Twitter: @jaysonjenks . Jayson Jenks covers the Seahawks for the Seattle Times. He also provides coverage of other Seattle-area teams throughout the year.
